response.original_title: America's Thrill Makers: Walt Disney World
response.overview: Follow six riders as they experience the newest and most thrilling rides at Walt Disney World.  The Documentary produced in 2003 and features, Disney/MGM Studios' Twilight Zone Tower of Terror and Rockin' Roller Coaster starring Aerosmith, Disney's Animal Kingdom's Dinosaur: Countdown to Extinction, Epcot's Test Track, and the newest thrill ride, Mission: Space.  The special explores what goes into designing a thrill ride, including the importance of story and the details behind managing riders' experience, before and during the actual ride.
response.title: America's Thrill Makers: Walt Disney World
